title.rendered: How to ride corners on an E-MTB

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”32″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1572015212804{margin-top: 20px !important;}”]

How to ride corners on your E-MTB

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”custom” align=”align_left” border_width=”8″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1562165593007{padding-right: 40px !important;}” accent_color=”#00daef”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][vc_column_text]

GO ELECTRIC!!!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Learn how to ride corners on your e-mountain bike

E-mountain bikes are becoming a staple part of the mountain biking community, featuring in every aspect of the MTB world, from Enduro World Series, to E-MTB world champs, to weekend adventures with your mates. But they do require a slightly different skill set and approach to almost every aspect of mountain biking.

In this episode of the #EMTBMinute Chris will show you how to corner on your e-mountain bike.

Follow our top tips and keep practising and you’ll be railing those corners on your local trails, and even on bigger adventures, with your E-MTB in no time![/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_video link=”https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z7aU6c46w-g”][vc_empty_space][vc_separator color=”custom” align=”align_left” border_width=”8″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1562165593007{padding-right: 40px !important;}” accent_color=”#00daef”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

6 steps for effective cornering on your E-MTB

  1. Look well ahead down the trail in front of you
  2. Start braking and managing your speed before you enter the corner
  3. Look round the corner at your exit point
  4. Turn your shoulders in the direction you’re travelling
  5. Allow the bike to roll smoothly round the corner, avoiding braking if you can
  6. Continue scanning the trail and look where you want to go

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_media_grid grid_id=”vc_gid:1700582825313-a7b42f3e-b0fe-6″ include=”311792,311793,311794″][vc_empty_space][vc_separator color=”custom” align=”align_left” border_width=”8″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1562165593007{padding-right: 40px !important;}” accent_color=”#00daef”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Tick, tick, tick, tick…

What can you learn in a minute? Well, quite a lot as it turns out…

From setting up your e-mountain bike to mastering cornering on an E-MTB, in the #EMTBminute we take on some of the most pressing questions around your e-mountain bike life and attempt to show you the key stages in just 60 seconds!

Using decades of collective guiding, riding and mechanical experience we’ve carefully created each minute-long video to give easy-to-follow, practical tips that will instantly demystify skills and techniques. They might still take a lifetime to master but with #EMTBminute at least you’ll be off to a solid start.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
